title: SOAP Web service client for Excel in VBA XML Scrape
snippet: One of the shipping providers my company uses hosts a web service to issue shipping quotes in SOAP format. I have coded some scraping utilities for a Google API and another which parse XML, but I am having trouble with this one. I need to be able to specify parameters in Excel cells, get shipping quotes in XML, parse the data, and populate cells in Excel with the data. I expect this to take no more than 2 hours of an expert's time since I can do most of the coding and debugging with an expert's help.
